item.name: Adaptec RAID: Logical Device Read-cache mode
Adaptec RAID: Logical Device Write-cache mode
Adaptec RAID: Logical Device Write-cache setting

trigger.expression: {Template - RAID - Adaptec:adaptecraid.status[pd,status,{$AD},{$PD_01}].last(0)}>0 or {Template - RAID - Adaptec:adaptecraid.status[pd,status,{$AD},{$PD_02}].last(0)}>0 or {Template - RAID - Adaptec:adaptecraid.status[pd,status,{$AD},{$PD_02}].last(0)}>0 or {Template - RAID - Adaptec:adaptecraid.status[pd,status,{$AD},{$PD_03}].last(0)}>0
trigger.name: One of the physical device has failed on {HOSTNAME}
Operating temperature of the controller is above a specified limit ({$AD_TEMPERATURE}C) on {HOSTNAME}
The state RAID controller is not optimal on {HOSTNAME}
The state RAID logical device is not optimal on {HOSTNAME}
